page.title: 19COME TO ASSYNT. (AN ADVERT)
page.content: "Spend a relaxing week or two amid the magnificent scenery of the North West Highlands. Visit Lochinver shadowed by the mountains of Suilven & Canisp a mere two-hour drive from Inverness. During your stay in this enchanting spot, the more adventurous can indulge in Fishing the many rivers and lochs or Sea angling, Boat trips to the Seal islands & watersports in the Bay. Or simply admire the superb views from the waterfront, taking in the local fishermen landing their daily catches. Spend a few days walking amongst the Hills & Glens, enjoying the scenery and the many & various wild animals & birds. We offer accommodation to suit everyone, and locally caught sea-food is a speciality, not to be missed. Quietly unwind in this famous area away from it all!"
